mapper.select: SELECT bno, menu_id, title, content, writer, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) regdate , hit FROM BOARD WHERE MENU_ID = #{ menu_id } ORDER BY bno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BNO, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(bno),0) + 1 FROM board), #{ menu_id }, #{ title }, #{ content }, #{ writer } )
